title: NewsBreak: Netflix Sinks, CEO Says Upcoming Competition Will Be Tough
text:
NewsBreak: Netflix Sinks, CEO Says Upcoming Competition Will Be Tough

Stock Markets 8 hours ago (Sep 20, 2019 11:13AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - The streaming wars are headed to a screen near you and Netflix (NASDAQ: ) CEO Reed Hastings just admitted it could be tough for his company. “It’ll be tough competition,” Hastings told Variety in an interview on Friday. “Direct-to-consumer (customers) will have a lot of choice.” A flurry of streaming services are expected in November, including Apple’s TV+, Disney + and NBCUniversal’s Peacock streaming service, not to mention already existing platforms Hulu and Amazon's (NASDAQ: ) Prime Video.

Shares of Netflix (NASDAQ: ) were down 4.7% in midday trade.

NewsBreak: Netflix Sinks, CEO Says Upcoming Competition Will Be Tough
description: NewsBreak: Netflix Sinks, CEO Says Upcoming Competition Will Be Tough
